==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|gmh|de}} {{m|gmh|wandern}}, from {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|*wantaron||wantarōn}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*wandrōną}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvandɐn/}} * {{hyphenation|de|wan|dern}} * {{audio|de|De-wandern.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-wandern.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|wandert|wanderte|gewandert|auxiliary=both}} # to [[hike]] # to [[wander]] ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak-ern|wand|gewandert|s}} or rarely {{de-conj-weak-ern|wand|gewandert|h}} ====Derived terms==== {{der-top3|Terms derived from the verb ''wandern''}} * {{l|de|abwandern}} * {{l|de|auswandern}} * {{l|de|bewandert}} * {{l|de|durchwandern}} * {{l|de|einwandern}} * {{l|de|umherwandern}} * {{l|de|unterwandern}} * {{l|de|zuwandern}} * {{l|de|Wanderarbeiter}} * {{l|de|Wanderausflug}} * {{l|de|Wanderausstellung}} * {{l|de|Wanderbursche}} * {{l|de|Wanderdrossel}} * {{l|de|Wanderer}} * {{l|de|Wanderfalke}} {{der-mid3}} * {{l|de|Wanderfalter}} * {{l|de|Wanderfisch}} * {{l|de|Wandergeselle}} * {{l|de|Wanderhackbau}} * {{l|de|Wanderheuschrecke}} * {{l|de|Wandern}} * {{l|de|Wanderniere}} * {{l|de|Wanderpokal}} * {{l|de|Wanderprediger}} * {{l|de|Wanderratte}} * {{l|de|Wanderschaft}} * {{l|de|Wanderschuh}} * {{l|de|Wandersfrau}} * {{l|de|Wandersmann}} * {{l|de|Wandersport}} * {{l|de|Wanderstab}} {{der-mid3}} * {{l|de|Wanderstiefel}} * {{l|de|Wanderstock}} * {{l|de|Wandertag}} * {{l|de|Wandertaube}} * {{l|de|Wanderung}} * {{l|de|Wanderverein}} * {{l|de|Wandervogel}} * {{l|de|Wanderwart}} * {{l|de|Wanderzirkus}} {{der-bottom}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
